membercontext.description: Sets context of the current login member.

attributes.model: Specify' user', Sets context of the current login user on the management screen.

iflogin.description: Evaluates a block when member is logged in.

attributes.setcontext: Sets context of the current login member.
attributes.model: Specify' user', It will be judged whether the user is logged in on the management screen.

ifmembersappurl.description: Evaluates a block when the URL of the member site application is set.

membersappurl.description: Output the URL of the member site application.

memberssignuptoken.description: Generate a magic_token to skip the confirmation screen and perform the action.
